COMMAND.name: redistribute
COMMAND.help: Redistribute information from another routing protocol

COMMAND.name: maximum-paths
COMMAND.help: Forward packets over multiple paths

COMMAND.name: network
COMMAND.help: Enable routing on an IP network

COMMAND.name: table-map
COMMAND.help: BGP table to RIB route download filter

COMMAND.name: aggregate-address
COMMAND.help: Configure BGP aggregate entries

PARAM.name: summary-only
PARAM.help: Filter more specific routes from updates

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_aggregate_address_config_aggregate_address_config ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${prefix} ${as-set} ${summary-only}
if test -z "${as-set}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_aggregate_address_config_aggregate_address_config_as_set ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${summary-only}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_global_afi_safis_afi_safi_aggregate_address_config_aggregate_address_config_summary_only ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance

PARAM.name: external
PARAM.help: Distance for routes external to the AS

PARAM.name: internal

COMMAND.name: no distance bgp
COMMAND.help: Define an administrative distance

COMMAND.name: advertise-all-vni
COMMAND.help: Advertise all local VNIs

COMMAND.name: advertise-default-gw
COMMAND.help: Advertise all default gw mac-ip routes in EVPN

COMMAND.name: advertise
COMMAND.help: Advertise prefix routes

COMMAND.name: advertise ipv4
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv4

COMMAND.name: advertise ipv4 unicast
COMMAND.help: SAFI unicast

COMMAND.name: advertise ipv6
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv6

COMMAND.name: advertise ipv6 unicast
COMMAND.help: SAFI unicast

COMMAND.name: default-originate
COMMAND.help: originate a default route

COMMAND.name: default-originate ipv4
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv4

COMMAND.name: default-originate ipv6
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv6

COMMAND.name: autort
COMMAND.help: Auto-derivation of RT

COMMAND.name: flooding
COMMAND.help: Specify handling for BUM packets

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Do not flood any BUM packets

PARAM.name: head-end-replication
PARAM.help: Flood BUM packets using head-end replication

COMMAND.name: rd
COMMAND.help: Route distinguisher

COMMAND.name: route-target
COMMAND.help: Route target

COMMAND.name: dup-addr-detection
COMMAND.help: Duplicate address detection

PARAM.name: max-moves
PARAM.help: Max allowed moves before address detected as duplicate

PARAM.name: nummoves
PARAM.help: Number of max allowed moves (2-1000) default 5

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${nummoves}" = "" -a "${timevalue}" = ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py patch_bgp_evpn_dad_enable ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py patch_bgp_evpn_dad_params ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${nummoves} ${timevalue}
fi

COMMAND.name: dup-addr-detection freeze
COMMAND.help: Duplicate address detection freeze
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${freezetype}" = "permanent"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py patch_bgp_evpn_dad_freeze ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN permanent
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py patch_bgp_evpn_dad_freeze ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${time}
fi

COMMAND.name: vni
COMMAND.help: Enter VNI config mode

COMMAND.name: no advertise-all-vni
COMMAND.help: Advertise all local VNIs

COMMAND.name: no advertise-default-gw
COMMAND.help: Advertise all default gw mac-ip routes in EVPN

COMMAND.name: no advertise
COMMAND.help: Advertise prefix routes

COMMAND.name: no advertise ipv4
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv4

COMMAND.name: no advertise ipv4 unicast
COMMAND.help: SAFI unicast

COMMAND.name: no advertise ipv6
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv6

COMMAND.name: no advertise ipv6 unicast
COMMAND.help: SAFI unicast

COMMAND.name: no default-originate
COMMAND.help: originate a default route

COMMAND.name: no default-originate ipv4
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv4

COMMAND.name: no default-originate ipv6
COMMAND.help: Address family IPv6

COMMAND.name: no autort
COMMAND.help: Auto-derivation of RT

COMMAND.name: no flooding
COMMAND.help: Specify handling for BUM packets

PARAM.name: disable
PARAM.help: Do not flood any BUM packets

PARAM.name: head-end-replication
PARAM.help: Flood BUM packets using head-end replication

COMMAND.name: no rd
COMMAND.help: Route distinguisher

COMMAND.name: no route-target
COMMAND.help: Route target

COMMAND.name: no dup-addr-detection
COMMAND.help: Duplicate address detection

PARAM.name: max-moves
PARAM.help: Max allowed moves before address detected as duplicate

PARAM.name: nummoves
PARAM.help: Number of max allowed moves (2-1000) default 5

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${nummoves}" = "" -a "${timevalue}" = ""; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py delete_bgp_evpn_dad_enable ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp-evpn.py delete_bgp_evpn_dad_params ${vrf-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${nummoves} ${timevalue}
fi

COMMAND.name: no dup-addr-detection freeze
COMMAND.help: Duplicate address detection freeze

COMMAND.name: no vni
COMMAND.help: Enter VNI config mode

COMMAND.name: activate
COMMAND.help: Enable the Address Family for this Neighbor

COMMAND.name: allowas-in
COMMAND.help: Allow local AS number in as-path

PARAM.name: origin
PARAM.help: Only accept my AS in the as-path if the route was originated in my AS

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
fi
if test -n "${origin}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN True
fi
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN True

COMMAND.name: route-map
COMMAND.help: Name of the route map (max 140 chars)

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-all-paths
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise all paths to a neighbor

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-bestpath-per-AS
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise the bestpath per each neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: as-override
COMMAND.help: Override ASNs in outbound updates if aspath equals remote-as

COMMAND.name: attribute-unchanged
COMMAND.help: BGP attribute is propagated unchanged to this neighbor
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" -o "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" = "as-pathmednext-hop"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN as-path med next-hop
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN ${as-path} ${med} ${next-hop}
if test -z "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${med}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: capability
COMMAND.help: _Advertise capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf
COMMAND.help: Advertise ORF capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Advertise prefixlist ORF capability to this neighbor

PARAM.name: send
PARAM.help: Capability to RECEIVE the ORF from this neighbor

PARAM.name: receive
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND the ORF to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND and RECEIVE the ORF to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: default-originate
COMMAND.help: Originate default route to this neighbor

PARAM.name: route-map
PARAM.help: Route-map to specify criteria to originate default

COMMAND.name: filter-list
COMMAND.help: Establish BGP filters

COMMAND.name: next-hop-self
COMMAND.help: Disable the next hop calculation for this neighbor

PARAM.name: force
PARAM.help: Set the next hop to self for reflected routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN True ${force}
if test -z "${force}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config_force ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Filter updates to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: remove-private-AS
COMMAND.help: Remove private ASNs in outbound updates

PARAM.name: replace-AS
PARAM.help: Replace private ASNs with our ASN in outbound updates

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN True ${all} ${replace-AS}
if test -z "${all}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_all ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${replace-AS}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_replace_as ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: route-reflector-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Reflector client

COMMAND.name: route-server-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Server client

COMMAND.name: send-community
COMMAND.help: Send Community attribute to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Send Standard and Extended Community attributes

COMMAND.name: soft-reconfiguration
COMMAND.help: Per neighbor soft reconfiguration

PARAM.name: inbound
PARAM.help: Allow inbound soft reconfiguration for this neighbor

COMMAND.name: unsuppress-map
COMMAND.help: Route-map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes

COMMAND.name: weight
COMMAND.help: Set default weight for routes from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: maximum-prefix
COMMAND.help: Maximum number of prefixes to accept from this peer

PARAM.name: threshold-val
PARAM.help: Threshold value (%) at which to generate a warning msg

PARAM.name: warning-only
PARAM.help: Only give warning message when limit is exceeded

PARAM.name: restart
PARAM.help: Restart bgp connection after limit is exceeded

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN ${max-prefix-val} ${threshold-val} ${maxpfopt} ${interval}
if test "${threshold-val}" = "0" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_warning_threshold_pct ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${warning-only}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_prevent_teardown ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${restart}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_restart_timer ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: no commands

COMMAND.name: no activate
COMMAND.help: Disable the Address Family for this Neighbor

COMMAND.name: no allowas-in
COMMAND.help: Allow local AS number in as-path

PARAM.help: Only accept my AS in the as-path if the route was originated in my AS

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
fi
if test -n "${origin}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN False
elif test -z "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN False
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
else
if test -n "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -n "${med}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -n "${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
fi

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
fi
if test -n "${origin}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN True
fi
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN True

COMMAND.name: route-map
COMMAND.help: Name of the route map (max 140 chars)

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-all-paths
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise all paths to a neighbor

COMMAND.name: addpath-tx-bestpath-per-AS
COMMAND.help: Use addpath to advertise the bestpath per each neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: as-override
COMMAND.help: Override ASNs in outbound updates if aspath equals remote-as

COMMAND.name: attribute-unchanged
COMMAND.help: BGP attribute is propagated unchanged to this neighbor
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -z "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" -o "${as-path}${med}${next-hop}" = "as-pathmednext-hop"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN as-path med next-hop
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${as-path} ${med} ${next-hop}
if test -z "${as-path}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_as_path ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${med}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_med ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${next-hop}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
fi

COMMAND.name: capability
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability orf
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to this neighbor

COMMAND.name: capability orf prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Advertise capability to this neighbor

PARAM.name: send
PARAM.help: Capability to RECEIVE the ORF from this neighbor

PARAM.name: receive
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND the ORF to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Capability to SEND and RECEIVE the ORF to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: default-originate
COMMAND.help: Originate default route to this neighbor

PARAM.name: route-map
PARAM.help: Route-map to specify criteria to originate default

COMMAND.name: filter-list
COMMAND.help: Establish BGP filters

COMMAND.name: next-hop-self
COMMAND.help: Disable the next hop calculation for this neighbor

PARAM.name: force
PARAM.help: Set the next hop to self for reflected routes

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN True ${force}
if test -z "${force}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_next_hop_self_config_force ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: prefix-list
COMMAND.help: Filter updates to/from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: remove-private-AS
COMMAND.help: Remove private ASNs in outbound updates

PARAM.name: replace-AS
PARAM.help: Replace private ASNs with our ASN in outbound updates

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN True ${all} ${replace-AS}
if test -z "${all}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_all ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${replace-AS}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_remove_private_as_config_replace_as ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: route-reflector-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Reflector client

COMMAND.name: route-server-client
COMMAND.help: Configure a neighbor as Route Server client

COMMAND.name: send-community
COMMAND.help: Send Community attribute to this neighbor

PARAM.name: both
PARAM.help: Send Standard and Extended Community attributes

COMMAND.name: soft-reconfiguration
COMMAND.help: Per neighbor soft reconfiguration

PARAM.name: inbound
PARAM.help: Allow inbound soft reconfiguration for this neighbor

COMMAND.name: unsuppress-map
COMMAND.help: Route-map to selectively unsuppress suppressed routes

COMMAND.name: weight
COMMAND.help: Set default weight for routes from this neighbor

COMMAND.name: maximum-prefix
COMMAND.help: Maximum number of prefixes to accept from this peer

PARAM.name: threshold-val
PARAM.help: Threshold value (%) at which to generate a warning msg

PARAM.name: warning-only
PARAM.help: Only give warning message when limit is exceeded

PARAM.name: restart
PARAM.help: Restart bgp connection after limit is exceeded

COMMAND.ACTION:
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py PATCH_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${max-prefix-val} ${threshold-val} ${maxpfopt} ${interval}
if test "${threshold-val}" = "0" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_warning_threshold_pct ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${warning-only}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_prevent_teardown ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
if test -z "${restart}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_l2vpn_evpn_config_prefix_limit_config_restart_timer ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi

COMMAND.name: no
COMMAND.help: no commands

COMMAND.name: no activate
COMMAND.help: Disable the Address Family for this Neighbor

COMMAND.name: no allowas-in
COMMAND.help: Allow local AS number in as-path

PARAM.name: origin
PARAM.help: Only accept my AS in the as-path if the route was originated in my AS

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
fi
if test -n "${origin}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN False
elif test -z "${value}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_as_count ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN ${value}
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_origin ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN False
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_allow_own_as_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN False
fi

python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py DELETE_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_peer_groups_peer_group_afi_safis_afi_safi_attribute_unchanged_config_next_hop ${vrf-name} ${template-name} L2VPN_EVPN
fi
fi
